description: Green Ronin Publishing has launched a new addition to their line of sourcebooks for The Expanse Roleplaying Game, titled “Trades of the Expanse: Pirate.” The book is now available for purchase through Green Ronin’s Online Store and DriveThruRPG. Written by Expanse RPG veteran Jason Mical, “Trades of the Expanse: Pirate” looks into the life and...
title: Green Ronin Publishing Releases “Trades of the Expanse: Pirate” for The Expanse RPG

description: In a spirited fusion of tabletop lore and craft beverages, New Holland Brewing Co. has teamed up with Wizards of the Coast to mark the 50th anniversary of Dungeons & Dragons with special edition drinks. The collaboration promises to add a touch of magic to the brewery’s storied Dragon’s Milk lineup. The limited edition offerings,...
title: New Holland Brewing Conjures Up a Dungeons & Dragons-Themed Brew and Bourbon
